item.description:
Believe it or not...
I've never been to the Quabbin! Always wanted to check it out and thought "who better to go with?"

I thought we could meet at the Dunkin Donuts on the corner of Comm Ave (Rt. 30) and Lexington St. at 9am and just take our time and enjoy a nice ride down 117 to the Wachusett Reservoir and continue to the Quabbin.
We can stop for breakfast or lunch (or both). I'm totally open for suggestions. Here's a map I made of the route I'd like to take.
http://maps.google.co...
This will be about 70 miles each way. Much more if we ride around the whole thing.
Don't forget your camera!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Scooters at corner of comm Ave and Lexington St.
item.name: Let's ride to the Quabbin!
